statements: SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT stem_cell_type, research_method FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT effect_description FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE research_method ILIKE '%PCR%';
SELECT study_id, publication_date FROM research_findings WHERE effect_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY study_id DESC;
SELECT study_id,stem_cell_type,research_method FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type='Embryonic' ORDER BY study_id ASC;
SELECT publication_date,stem_cell_type FROM research_findings WHERE effect_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT study_id,stem_cell_type,effect_description FROM research_findings WHERE research_method='PCR' AND publication_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY study_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic'
SELECT id, findings, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM research_authors WHERE field_of_study = 'Biology'
SELECT institution, author_name FROM research_authors WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT id, author_name, email FROM research_authors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, findings, researcher_name FROM research_findings WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(researcher_name) AS research_count FROM research_findings GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING research_count > 1;
SELECT author_name, institution, field_of_study FROM research_authors ORDER BY author_name ASC, institution DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings JOIN research_authors ON research_findings.researcher_name = research_authors.author_name WHERE research_authors.field_of_study = 'Neuroscience';
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT id, finding_description FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic';
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name, email FROM researchers WHERE institution_name = 'Harvard University';
SELECT * FROM research_findings WHERE effect_type = 'Regeneration';
SELECT researcher_name, institution_name FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT finding_description FROM research_findings WHERE stem_cell_type = 'Embryonic' AND effect_type = 'Differentiation';
SELECT researchers.researcher_name, research_findings.finding_description FROM researchers JOIN research_findings ON researchers.researcher_id = research_findings.id;
SELECT * FROM StemCellResearch;
SELECT research_title, research_author, publication_date FROM StemCellResearch;
SELECT * FROM StemCellTypes WHERE cell_type_name = 'Embryonic Stem Cells';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM ResearchAuthors WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT journal_name, publication_year, impact_factor FROM PublicationJournals ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM StemCellResearch ORDER BY research_author DESC;
SELECT research_title, publication_date FROM StemCellResearch WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT r.research_title, j.journal_name FROM StemCellResearch r JOIN PublicationJournals j ON r.publication_date = j.publication_year;
SELECT cell_type_name, differentiation_status FROM StemCellTypes WHERE culture_conditions IS NULL;
SELECT author_name, email FROM ResearchAuthors WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_title, study_date FROM research_studies WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY research researcher_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT isolation_method) AS methods FROM experimental_groups JOIN cell_types ON experimental_groups.group_id = cell_types.cell_id GROUP BY group_name;
SELECT result_id, result_data->>'$.value' AS result_value FROM results WHERE study_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_title, study_description FROM research_studies WHERE study_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY study_title DESC;

SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM researchers JOIN results ON researchers.researcher_id = results.researcher_id WHERE results.result_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY affiliation ASC, researcher_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, treatment_protocol FROM experimental_groups WHERE group_description LIKE '%effect%' ORDER BY group_name;
SELECT result_data FROM results WHERE study_id = 5 AND result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
